doc.field: Long Island College Hospital School of Nursing Alumnae Association records
Long Island College Hospital School of Nursing Alumnae Association records
Series 2: Board of Directors meeting minutes
Series 2: Board of Directors meeting minutes

The series contains LICH School of Nursing Alumnae Association meeting minutes. It includes two journals of general Alumnae Association meetings minutes (1895-1910), one journal of the association's Board of Directors meeting minutes (1903-1913), the Board President's notebook (1959-1974), and a set of typescripts and handwritten Board of Directors meeting minutes (1987, 1994-1995). The series also contains handwritten explanatory notes written by the donor to assist researchers.
